title: CSKHPKV Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Field Investigator Posts
description: The Chaudhary Sarwan Kumar Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishvavidyalaya (CSKHPKV) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Field Investigator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc. and Post-Graduation can apply for the CSKHPKV Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
